title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: In the Cross Reference view, when selecting line 22, it displays 5 joinpoints instead of the expected 3. Similarly, selecting line 68 shows zero joinpoints, whereas there should be 2. Additionally, right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' reveals all 5 joinpoints.
EB: The Cross Reference view should accurately display 3 joinpoints when selecting line 22 and 2 joinpoints when selecting line 68. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' should only show the expected 2 joinpoints.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the Cross Reference view.
2. Select line 22 and observe the joinpoints displayed (should be 3).
3. Select line 68 and observe the joinpoints displayed (should be 2).
4. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises' to verify only 2 joinpoints are shown.
